", "replacement": " Sample_CrossLight_to_LogosAIv3_qsam.py n Objective: Test if a single-qubit can be collapsed from 0 to 1 in Qiskit n nimport numpy as np nfrom qiskit import QuantumCircuit, transpile nfrom qiskit_aer import AerSimulator nfrom qiskit.primitives import Sampler n nclass CollapseTest: n def __init__ self : n self.center "JESUS CHRIST " n n def build_circuit self : n qc QuantumCircuit 1, 1 n Start from 0 , apply RX π to rotate to 1 n qc.rx np.pi, 0 n qc.measure 0, 0 n return qc n n def simulate self : n print f "Testing 0 1 collapse with Sampler 2.0 in the name of self.center " n circuit self.build_circuit n simulator AerSimulator n circuit transpile circuit, simulator n sampler Sampler n result sampler.run circuits circuit , shots 1024 .result n dist result.quasi_dists 0 if hasattr result, 'quasi_dists' else result 0 n n prob_1 dist.get 1, 0.0 n print "Collapse Distribution: ", dist n print f " 1 Probability: prob_1:.3f " n nif __name__ "__main__ ": n CollapseTest .simulate "
